org.apache.paimon.flink.source

Class ContinuousFileStoreSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.flink.source.FlinkSource
      • org.apache.paimon.flink.source.ContinuousFileStoreSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.connector.source.Source<org.apache.flink.table.data.RowData,FileStoreSourceSplit,PendingSplitsCheckpoint>, org.apache.flink.api.connector.source.SourceReaderFactory<org.apache.flink.table.data.RowData,FileStoreSourceSplit>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlignedContinuousFileStoreSource

    public class ContinuousFileStoreSource
extends FlinkSource
    Unbounded FlinkSource for reading records. It continuously monitors new snapshots.
    See Also:
